This college is as safe as your life is.
Very busy and self motivated students
Rio longe. An online cafe
The school is able to provide Rio only text books this means that they can be claimed on the tax return 100% and then the other books that are not Rio books can be rented.
What ever you wnat the classes are basically 24 hours a day.
Eat where ever you want this is an online college.
Nope. Live at home in my own place
Study hard not you might not this opportunity later.

Take a College Preparation class, it sound silly but it was so worth it. It is also important to take at least one fun class a semester. It is kind of like a reward for taking classes that are required.

I love Rio I get to complete college on my time. I am a mother, a full time employee, and a full time student and even have time for a social life. Rio makes all this possible with their flexibility of online classes.
